title: Grammys Livestream: Watch Official 2025 Premiere Ceremony
description: Music’s biggest night is now music’s biggest — and longest — day. Hours ahead of the 67th annual Grammys on Sunday (CBS, 8/7c), the Recording Academy is kicking off the festivities with a Premiere Ceremony, where the majority of this year’s 94 awards will be handed out. And you can watch a livestream of the […]
author: Andy Swift

title: How to Watch the 2025 Grammys Livestream Online
description: The 2025 Grammys are right around the corner. Here’s everything you need to know for streaming the star-studded event online, plus the full list of confirmed performances and nominees. As previously announced, Trevor Noah returns to host this year’s ceremony, which kicks off Sunday, Feb. 2 at 8/7c, on CBS. (But mark your calendars: The […]
